sentences.sContent: His books have sold more than 20 million copies worldwide.
sentences.sCn: 他的书在全世界卖出了两千多万本。

sentences.sContent: ...in part because journals and funding agencies worldwide are encouraging scientists to make their data public...
...No wonder only 13% of employees worldwide feel engaged in their occupation...
...Russia is trying hard to counter America’s dominance in the field of worldwide navigational facilities...
...is one of only a few scientists worldwide involved in bioengineering 'cultured' meat...

trans.tranOther: If something exists or happens worldwide, it exists or happens throughout the world
